text: A.P. Moller–Maersk Group (Danish: A.P. Møller–Mærsk A/S, ), also known as Maersk, is a Danish business conglomerate. A.P. Møller – Maersk Group has activities in a variety of business sectors, primarily within the transportation and energy sectors. It has been the largest container ship operator and supply vessel operator in the world since 1996. The Maersk Group is based in Copenhagen, Denmark,"Contact Us ." Maersk. Retrieved on 22 September 2011. "Headquarters A.P. Møller - Mærsk A/S Esplanaden 50 1098 Copenhagen K Denmark " with subsidiaries and offices in more than 135 countries worldwide and around 89,000 employees. It ranked 142 on the Forbes Global 2000 list for 2014. ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Denmark Category:1904 establishments in Europe Category:Ships Category:Transport in Denmark Category:Companies of Denmark Category:Organizations based in Copenhagen
title: Maersk
